info.title: changeManagement
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF changeManagement specification

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

parameters.name: actualEndTime
parameters.description: Date and time when the change implementation is finished actually.

parameters.name: actualStartTime
parameters.description: Date and time when the change implementation is started actually.

parameters.name: budget
parameters.description: The budget reserved for the change.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The Category of chang request

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: A channel represents the way the Change Request was created

parameters.name: completionDate
parameters.description: Date and time when the change request is confirmed to be completed

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The used currency related with cost

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the change request.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: ID given by the requestor to facilitate the relationship set up and searches afterwards)

parameters.name: href
parameters.description: Hyperlink to access a change request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of a Change Request, it is created on repository side (Change Management system).

parameters.name: impact
parameters.description: Indicates how about the impact by this change

parameters.name: plannedEndTime
parameters.description: Date and time when the change implementation is planned to be finished.

parameters.name: plannedStartTime
parameters.description: Date and time when the change implementation is planned to be started.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: A way that can be used by consumers to prioritize change request in Change Management system

parameters.name: requestDate
parameters.description: Date and time when the change request is raised

parameters.name: requestType
parameters.description: Indicates the type of the change request.

parameters.name: risk
parameters.description: The risk to implement this change request.

parameters.name: riskMitigationPlan
parameters.description: The risk mitigation plan.

parameters.name: riskValue
parameters.description: The additional cost if the risk will happen.

parameters.name: scheduledDate
parameters.description: Date and time that the schedule is made.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the change request and it’s a sub-state.

parameters.name: thePost_ChangeRequest
parameters.description: The ChangeRequest Type to be created

parameters.name: changeRequest_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the changeRequest

post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data containing the callback endpoint to deliver the information

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the registered listener

Attachment.description: A document or other file attached to the information about a Change Request to help explain the change being implemented as part of this Change Request.

relatedPartyRef.description: Defines parties which are involved in the change request and the role they are playing. It may be the customer, operator or 3rd party.

dateTime.description: Date and time of the attachment generated.

ChangeRequest.description: Change Request is a type of request which can be used for the management and control of Change Management process between a customer and a service provider or between a service provider and a partner and vice versa.

sLARef.description: A component that holds details of the SLA being applied to the change request.

changeRequestCharacteristic.description: Characteristics of the change request to instantiate or to modify

changeRequestSpecification.description: Defines a set of attributes related to Change Request.

workLog.description: A record of the work performed on the change request during the investigation and resolution process.

targetEntityRef.description: The entity which will be changed or configured while the change request is executed.

impactEntityRef.description: Defines the entities (product, service , resource,  and other related objects) which will be impacted while the change request is executed.

relatedChangeRequestRef.description: An existing Change Request that has some form of correlation with the given Change Request.

location.description: The place at whcih the change request occurred.

note.description: Defines the additional information of the change request.

resolution.description: The way one or more change request has been implementation through a direct remedy or task.

relatedPartyRef.description: Defines parties which are involved in the change request and the role they are playing. It may be the customer, operator or 3rd party.

attachment.description: A document or other file attached to the information about a Change Request to help explain the change being implemented as part of this Change Request.

incident.description: An Incident is a record of an event that has altered the operational state of a entity (Resource, Service or Customer's Product).

actualEndTime.description: Date and time when the change implementation is finished actually.

actualStartTime.description: Date and time when the change implementation is started actually.

budget.description: The budget reserved for the change.

channel.description: A channel represents the way the Change Request was created

completionDate.description: Date and time when the change request is confirmed to be completed

currency.description: The used currency related with cost

externalId.description: ID given by the requestor to facilitate the relationship set up and searches afterwards)

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

ImpactEntityRef.description: Defines the entities (product, service , resource,  and other related objects) which will be impacted while the change request is executed.

description.description: a description and analysis of the impact of the change request on the Product, Service or Resource.

href.description: Hyperlink to access the impacted party, it could be a party reference or a party role reference.

Incident.description: An Incident is a record of an event that has altered the operational state of a entity (Resource, Service or Customer's Product).

impactEntityRef.description: Defines the entities (product, service , resource,  and other related objects) which will be impacted while the change request is executed.

Location.description: The place at whcih the change request occurred.

address.description: The detail address of the location.

postCode.description: The post code of an address.

Note.description: Defines the additional information of the change request.

dateTime.description: Date and time when the description was inputted.
The date time that a record is generated.

description.description: The detail description in a record.

supportPerson.description: The person who logged that record.

RelatedChangeRequestRef.description: An existing Change Request that has some form of correlation with the given Change Request.

correlation.description: The correlation between two change requests

href.description: Hyper link to access a change request.

RelatedPartyRef.description: Defines parties which are involved in the change request and the role they are playing. It may be the customer, operator or 3rd party.

href.description: Hyperlink to access a related party.

Resolution.description: The way one or more change request has been implementation through a direct remedy or task.

task.description: A step or task along in the process of  implementation a Change Request.

code.description: The resolution's code, it can be configured as a multiple level hierarchy.

SLARef.description: A component that holds details of the SLA being applied to the change request.

TargetEntityRef.description: The entity which will be changed or configured while the change request is executed.

description.description: The description to the related party.

href.description: Hyperlink to access the target entity.

Task.description: A step or task along in the process of  implementation a Change Request.

ValidFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

WorkLog.description: A record of the work performed on the change request during the investigation and resolution process.

creatDateTime.description: Date and time of worklog generated.

lastUpdateDateTime.description: Date and time when the worklog updated.

code.description: An integer coding the error type. This is given to caller so he can translate them if required.

message.description: A short localized string that describes the error.

description.description: (optional) A long localized error description if needed. It can contain precise information about which parameter is missing, or what are the identifier acceptable values.

infoURL.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.
